item.title: 据说 TeamViewer 接近收购凯雷投资的软件公司 1E
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，远程办公软件制造商 TeamViewer SE 接近从凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：TeamViewer SE, the maker of remote-working software, is close to buying 1E from Carlyle Group Inc. in the German firm’s largest-ever acquisition, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说保诚正在权衡资产管理公司瀚亚的各种选择
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，保诚集团（Prudential Plc）正在考虑各种方案，包括出售其资产管理公司瀚亚投资（Eastspring Investments）的少数股权，以帮助拓宽业务。【原文：Prudential Plc is considering options including selling a minority stake in its asset manager Eastspring Investments to help broaden the business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特人为何希望在海湾地区举办第二届世界杯足球赛
item.description: 近年来，沙特阿拉伯向赛车、高尔夫、网球和拳击等运动投入了数十亿美元，在全球体育界拥有巨大的影响力。现在，这个石油资源丰富的王国即将赢得世界上最负盛名的足球赛事--世界杯的主办权。世界杯赛唯一一次在阿拉伯海湾国家举办是在 2022 年，地点是小小的卡塔尔酋长国。比赛改在冬季举行，以避开炎热的天气。【原文：Saudi Arabia wields enormous influence in global sport after channeling billions of dollars into such pursuits as racing, golf, tennis and boxing in recent years. Now, the oil-rich kingdom is set to win the right to host the world’s most prestigious football tournament: the World Cup. The only time the competition has ever been held in an Arab Gulf country was in 2022, in the tiny emirate of Qatar — and it happened amid considerable controversy. Games were shifted to the winter to avoid the hot】

item.title: 马克龙扩大谈判，寻求稳定的法国政府
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙将于周二召集众多政党举行会议，努力寻找新总理接替米歇尔-巴尼耶，巴尼耶政府上周因预算纠纷而下台。【原文：Emmanuel Macron will bring together a broad group of political parties for a meeting on Tuesday, in an effort to find a new prime minister to replace Michel Barnier, whose government was ousted last week over a budget dispute.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员将就缩减多少才能促进经济展开争论
item.description: 欧洲央行官员一致认为，需要降低利率来提振该地区摇摇欲坠的经济。不过，他们对降息的实际帮助有多大还存在激烈的争议。【原文：European Central Bank officials agree that lower interest rates are needed to buoy the region’s shaky economy. How much they can actually help, though, is hotly contested.】

item.title: 欧洲风电扩张已到极限
item.description: 欧洲开始发现，长达数十年的海上风电热潮已经到了极限。【原文：Europe is starting to find the limit of a decades-long boom in offshore wind.】

item.title: 中国承诺刺激经济后将扩大预算并降低利率
item.description: 在中国最高领导人发出多年来最大胆的刺激信号之后，中国明年可能将预算赤字提高到三十年来的最高水平，并进行 2015 年以来最大幅度的降息。【原文：China may raise its budget deficit to the highest in three decades and make the deepest interest-rate cuts since 2015 next year following the boldest stimulus signals from its top leaders in years.】

item.title: 中国铝出口激增，贸易商试图避开税收调整
item.description: 由于出口商急于从本月开始取消的税收折扣中获益，中国 11 月份的铝发货量接近创纪录水平。【原文：China shipped near-record volumes of aluminum in November as exporters rushed to benefit from tax discounts that were canceled from the start of this month.】

item.title: 卡斯皮领导的在线零售借贷引起哈萨克斯坦监管机构的关注
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦网上市场的蓬勃发展部分归功于一种广受欢迎的融资方式，而这种融资方式因担心通货膨胀和消费者债务负担日益加重而受到监管机构的审查。【原文：Kazakhstan’s booming online marketplaces are thriving thanks in part to a popular financing offer that’s now drawing regulator scrutiny over worries about inflation and a growing consumer debt burden.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将关键利率维持在 13 年高位，认为物价有所改善
item.description: 澳大利亚央行将其关键利率维持在 13 年高位，同时补充说，它 "获得了一些信心"，通胀正在可持续地向目标迈进，这促使交易商加大了对 2 月份宽松政策的押注。【原文：Australia’s central bank held its key interest rate at a 13-year high while adding it’s “gaining some confidence” inflation is moving sustainably toward target, prompting traders to boost bets on an easing in February.】

item.title: 印度任命新任印度央行行长后，债券或因降息押注而上涨
item.description: 印度政府任命职业官僚桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）为新任印度储备银行行长后，分析师押注降息，印度债券有望上涨。【原文：Indian bonds are poised to gain as analysts bet on an interest-rate cut after the government named career bureaucrat Sanjay Malhotra as the new Reserve Bank of India governor.】

item.title: 中国出口增长，企业抢先应对特朗普关税
item.description: 中国企业急于在美国征收新关税前将货物运往美国，推动了 11 月份出口的增长，而进口却意外下降，这是国内经济疲软的又一迹象。【原文：Companies in China rushing to get goods to the US before new tariffs are imposed drove exports higher in November, while imports unexpectedly fell in another sign of the weak domestic economy.】

item.title: 投资者要求印度央行允许将国债作为零息债券出售
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，投资者敦促印度储备银行允许将邦政府债务转为零息债券。【原文：Investors urged the Reserve Bank of India to allow state government debt to be turned into zero-coupon bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国反对党玩弄权术强行通过预算案
item.description: 韩国反对党领袖李在明周二试图强行通过一项争议很大的预算案，以显示其政治影响力，同时他还试图为未来几天再次弹劾总统尹硕烈造势。【原文：South Korean opposition leader Lee Jae-myung sought to force through a highly contested budget Tuesday in a show of political clout as he seeks to build momentum for another impeachment bid against President Yoon Suk Yeol in the coming days.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称亚洲经济足以抵御动荡
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund, 简称 "基金组织"）的经济学家们表示，亚洲经济体有足够的韧性来渡过动荡，并强调了在该地区面临各种内部风险以及唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之际大步应对动荡的重要性。【原文：Asian economies are resilient enough to ride out turbulence, International Monetary Fund economists said, underscoring the importance of taking turmoils in stride at a time when the region faces various internal risks in addition to Donald Trump’s return to the White House.】

item.title: 外国投资者因对降息持乐观态度而重返印度股市
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 顶级学者称日本央行应加息以防落后风险
item.description: 一位曾担任首相顾问的著名经济学教授表示，日本央行应尽早上调基准利率，而且它面临着已经落后于曲线的风险。【原文：The Bank of Japan should raise its benchmark interest rate early, and it faces the risk it has already fallen behind the curve, according to a prominent economics professor who was an adviser to the prime minister.】

item.title: 马来西亚立法者批准扩大互联网控制的法案
item.description: 马来西亚立法者投票赞成扩大政府对互联网的控制，对法律可能压制异议和言论自由的批评不为所动。【原文：Malaysian lawmakers voted in favor of broadening the government’s control over the internet, unmoved by criticism that the law risks suppressing dissent and free speech.】

item.title: 据说星展银行和日本顶级贷款机构是巴宁银行的竞标者之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，包括星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）、三菱UFJ金融集团公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.）和三井住友金融集团公司（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.）在内的亚洲银行都是印尼泛亚银行的潜在收购者。【原文：Asian banks including DBS Group Holdings Ltd., Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. and Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. are among potential suitors for PT Bank Pan Indonesia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拓普康获得 KKR 和 EQT 的收购出价，日本并购案升温
item.description: 拓普康公司正在权衡包括 KKR & Co. 和 EQT AB 在内的收购者的出价，这是日本收购活动不断升级的最新迹象。【原文：Topcon Corp. is weighing takeover bids from suitors including KKR & Co. and EQT AB, the latest sign of escalating buyout activity in Japan.】

item.title: 全球投资者一周内抢购 30 亿美元印度股票
item.description: 在印度股市大幅下挫之后，外国资金正在重返印度股市，因为市场对降息越来越乐观。【原文：Foreign funds are returning to the Indian stock market after a massive selloff, amid growing optimism over interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 交易员认为中国收益率将跌至 1.5%，一切反弹希望渺茫
item.description: 中国明年将转向更宽松的货币政策，这刺激了对中国主权债务收益率将从历史低点进一步下滑的看涨押注。【原文：China’s shift toward a looser monetary policy next year is spurring bullish bets that yields on its sovereign debt will further tumble from record lows.】

item.title: 高层领导发出加大刺激力度的信号后中国股市反弹
item.description: 中国最高领导人做出了多年来最强有力的振兴经济增长的承诺后，中国股市周二跳涨。【原文：Chinese shares jumped Tuesday after the country’s top leaders made their strongest pledge in years to revive economic growth.】

item.title: 小米预告夏季将推出类似特斯拉的 SUV，大力拓展电动汽车市场
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）展示了一款新型 SUV，该公司计划在 2025 年夏季左右销售这款 SUV，并加大力度在全球最大的电动汽车领域与特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Xiaomi Corp. showed off a new SUV it plans to sell around the summer of 2025, intensifying an effort to take on Tesla Inc. and BYD Co. in the world’s biggest electric vehicle arena.】

item.title: 阿波罗首席执行官动用现金购买 4.31 亿美元股份，最终可能出售
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）正在抛售 4.31 亿美元的公司股票，并可能最终出售这些股票，因为他希望获得与该公司相关的部分财富。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan is putting up $431 million of the company’s stock, and could end up selling it, as he looks to access some of his wealth tied to the firm.】

item.title: 韩国股票在政治危机中损失 1000 亿美元后上涨
item.description: 韩国股市周二上涨，自上周短暂的戒严令使该国陷入政治动荡以来首次实现单日上涨。【原文：South Korean equities rose on Tuesday, seeking their first daily advance since last week’s short-lived martial law thrust the country into political turmoil.】

item.title: 澳大利亚商业信心下滑，经济前景不容乐观
item.description: 澳大利亚 11 月份的商业信心急剧下降，衡量就业、销售和盈利能力的指标进一步疲软，这再次表明私营经济正面临巨大压力。【原文：Australia’s business confidence fell sharply in November and conditions, which measure jobs, sales and profitability, softened further in another sign that the private sector of the economy is under heavy pressure.】

item.title: 信实工业寻求多达 30 亿美元的再融资贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）拥有的信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）正在与银行谈判，以获得多达 30 亿美元的贷款，为明年到期的债务进行再融资。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Industries is in talks with banks for a loan of as much as $3 billion to refinance debt due next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国数据或影响美联储利率走势，黄金在此之前保持升势
item.description: 黄金在上涨后趋于稳定，因为交易商将焦点转向了本周将发布的关键性美国通胀报告，这些报告可能会在美联储今年最后一次利率决议前左右市场预期。【原文：Gold steadied after an advance as traders shifted focus to key US inflation reports due this week that may shape expectations ahead of the Federal Reserve’s final interest-rate decision of the year.】

item.title: 人工智能盈利的秘诀是雇佣更多博士
item.description:
从发现棉田中的杂草到扫描灌木丛以寻找偷猎者的踪迹，人工智能初创公司正在招募数十名专家来完成高度专业化的任务。【原文：

From spotting weeds in cotton fields to scanning the bush for signs of poachers, AI startups are recruiting scores of experts for highly specialized tasks.

】
